name: Word Battle for Facebook
description:
Word Battle is an exciting and addictive, real time, multiplayer word game. You can choose your opponents either from friend and family cycle, or wide Facebook user audience.

Gameplay: each user is given the same 9 random letters where each letter has some value assigned. In 40 seconds you need to come up with a word, which gives you as many points as possible. It is up to you what strategy you choose to win a battle. The one with the highest word score wins.

Word building is really fun! Moreover, the ability to compete with others makes it even more gripping.

If you're a big fan of word games such Scrabble, Boggle, Ruzzle or Word With Friends and want to play something that would help to progress in word building then you should give this a try! Word Battle is a great game to practice spelling skills.

What our players have to say:

-- World Battle helps increase our word power and so with the spellings of words
-- Great game! Great way to exercise your brain.
-- Great Vocabulary Builder This game helps me keep my mind and memory sharp. Thanks! I really like challenges!

Use of this application requires a Facebook account.
